purpose: To enable the creation of customized software applications through natural language inputs by leveraging multi-agent collaboration.
principle: Utilizes large language models (LLMs) to interpret natural language ideas and coordinates multiple agents to collaboratively develop software.
reusability: Designed to be extended with new agents and integrated into larger systems, providing APIs for interaction.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, it may have limited functionality and stability issues; specific to software development use cases.
name: ChatDev
description: Create Customized Software using Natural Language Idea (through LLM-powered Multi-Agent Collaboration)
highlight: Facilitates multi-agent collaboration for customized software creation using natural language inputs.
